paper_keywords: Competitive Algorithm of Simulating Nature Tree Growth
paper_abstract: This article presents a novel 16-element array antenna designed by Competitive Algorithm of Simulating Natural Tree Growth. The array antenna has an impedance bandwidth ranging from 5.5 to 6.2 GHz for S11 <-10 dB, and the directive gain reaches 18.4 dBi. According to the simulated result, a prototype was fabricated and measured. Good agreement was obtained between the simulated and measured results. (C) 2012 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Int J RF and Microwave CAE 22: 669674, 2012.
paper_title: A high gain tree-shaped array antenna designed by competitive algorithm of simulating natural tree growth
